name: Cyclotone 4.3 (Manifold)
description:
An ongoing audiovisual work [2012-2021]. Performed at Mutek, Elektra, Ars Electronica and Resonate, among others. 

‘By gyrostatic action, the machine is transparent to successive intervals of time. It does not endure or ‘continue to be’, but rather conserves its contents outside of time, sheltered from all phenomena. The machine’s immobility in time is directly proportional to the rate of rotation of its gyro stats in space'
- How to Construct a Time Machine, Alfred Jarry [1899]

This still → Oct 2021. 

Artwork → Paul Prudence @MrPrudence
